Class PromissoryNote

    Content

    public class PromissoryNote
extends Letter<Money>
    The promissory note is a letter containing money.

      • action

        public void action()
        When the receiver open the letter his account is credited. For think him, the receiver send letter for the sender. A message appears in the Standard output representing this action.
